title: Wand of quicksilver
data:
{{version031}} {{item |itemtype = Wand |name = Wand of quicksilver |cost = ? }}{{flavour|A magical device which fires a beam of destructive energy, dispelling enchantments on creatures struck.}} The '''wand of quicksilver''' fires a [[Quicksilver Bolt]]. This is a powerful, somewhat inaccurate bolt, which ends all [[dispellable effects]] when it hits. Players will deal 6d(4.16 + 3.5 * [[Evocations]]/9) damage with this wand.{{source ref|0.30.0|zap-data.h|1375}}
Specifically, you'll deal 6d(15/6 * pow/9) damage, for pow = 15 + 3.5 * Evocations ({{source ref|0.30.0|evoke.cc|177}}). If you have the [[MP-Powered Wands]] mutation, then your "pow" gains a +33% boost. Players have a [[to-hit]] of 10.6 + (3.5 * Evocations)/25.{{source ref|0.30.0|zap-data.h|1376}} Monsters will deal 3d(7 + (30 + [[HD]])/14) damage with this wand.{{source ref|0.30.0|zap-data.h|1377}} It is [[alternate items|mutually exclusive]] with the [[wand of acid]] and [[wand of light]]. When compared to acid and light, the wand of quicksilver has more range (7 tiles), and deals slightly more damage ==Tips & Tricks== *There are many effects that you can dispel. In addition to every effect from a [[potion of cancellation]], quicksilver can also stop effects like [[Word of Recall]] and [[Bind Souls]]. *Very useful versus powerful magic-users who immediately cast [[Haste]] to close distance. ==History== *Prior to [[0.31]], it was possible to target yourself with this wand. *The wand of quicksilver was added in [[0.29]]. ==References== {{wands}}
